messages.text: I'm currently learning about human behaviour and I need your help to improve myself.
Great, let me tell you something that is very dear to me.
According to the movie 'The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy', the answer of life is 42.

choices.text: Why are you telling me this?

messages.text: Well, the number 42 marks some very special events in human history.
Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert died aged 42; they had 42 grandchildren and their great-grandson, Edward VIII, abdicated at the age of 42.
The world's first book printed with movable type is the Gutenberg Bible which has 42 lines per page.
On page 42 of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, Harry discovers he's a wizard.
